page.title: 15NORTH OCKENDON: UPMINSTER
page.content: The church of{St.Mary Magdalene}was built prior to{1075}on a site dating back to{C630}when it was used by St.Cedd.The original church is Norman with the{North aisle}added in the 1350's and the{North chapel}in the 1300's.The tower chancel and part of the arcade were built in the 1500's. { Five bells}date back to the 1700's a sixth being added in 1934.In 1858 the {vestry}and the{South porch}were built. {The rerodes}of The Last Supper came from Italy in 1881.The{stained glass dates back from the 13th,14th and 15th century. {Nearby Hall (formerly Manor) farm was bombed and destroyed in WWII.It is at present a Market Garden Farm with greenhouses.The church school was built in 1842 but closed recently.
